title: Android could soon start warning users when they run 32-bit apps
content:
Although Google has been making efforts to drop 32-bit app support on Android for the last few years, it may still be a while before 32-bit apps become a thing of the past. In a bid to speed up the process, however, Google could soon implement a new change in Android that will warn users

The post Android could soon start warning users when they run 32-bit apps appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A recent code change submitted to the AOSP Gerrit highlights that Android could start warning users when they run 32-bit apps. Read on to learn more.
